          <title>
            <string language="en">Phase diagram of water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zustandsdiagramm des Wassers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Diagramme de phase de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Diagrama de fase da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schema di fase di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάγραμμα φάσης του ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diagrama de fase del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This phase diagram shows the temperature and pressure regions where all of the three phases of water occur.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">boiling point</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Zustandsdiagramm zeigt die Temperatur- und
Druckregionen, in denen alle drei Phasen des Wassers auftreten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme de phase montre les régions de la 
température et de pression où toutes les trois phases de l'eau se 
produisent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de fase mostra as regiões da 
temperatura e da pressão onde todas as três fases da água ocorrem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema di fase mostra le regioni di 
pressione e di temperatura dove tutte le tre fasi di acqua accadono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα φάσης εμφανίζει περιοχές 
θερμοκρασίας και πίεσης όπου όλες οι τρεις φάσεις ύδατος 
εμφανίζονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama de fase muestra las regiones de la 
temperatura y de la presión donde ocurren todas las tres fases del 
agua.</string>
          </description>
